title: Virtual assistant for a couple of calls
snippet:
I need a person to make a few calls in US, collect data in the spreadsheet and that is it. 
There is no more than ten calls total and shouldn't be longer than 2 hours. 
You should be US based or being able to call US landlines via Skype.

I need this done as soon as possible so, please, apply if you can start right away.
I will have a more work to come so you can treat this as a test job. 

Thank you so much for your applications.
